Extract Text

Extract plain text from PDF. BlinkPDF's Extract Text tool is fast, private and easy to use.

Use this tool to extract plain text from pdf.

Use the upload box above and set basic options here if any.

BlinkPDF's Extract Text helps you extract plain text from pdf. with accuracy and speed. Designed for professionals and casual users alike, it supports large files and keeps your data secure.

Files are processed safely and efficiently. We focus on preserving quality while reducing processing time.

Ideal for daily workflows, academic projects, business reporting and archiving.

  • Fast processing
  • Secure handling
  • High quality output
  • Mobile & desktop friendly

How to use

  1. Upload your file(s)
  2. Open Advanced Settings to tweak options if needed
  3. Click Process and download the result

FAQ

Q: Is my data safe?

A: Yes — files are processed securely and removed after processing.

Q: Are there limits?

A: Most tools support large files; check tool page notes.
